column4: i let windows running 1 afternoon and when i got back net wasnt workin
ppl clamav had some errors so wht do i do now ?
what do i write in terminal ?
well thats a bit too l8
so how do i start clamav ?
what are you using clamav for?  are you running a mail server?
ok, so what's the virus scanner for?
hang on, are you trying to scan your windows or linux drive for viruses?
clamav is mostly for scanning mail for viruses so that Windows machines don't get infected
sorry, I don't know what the command is.  I've never used a virus scanner.
